boardgame.name: Escape the Room: Das Geheimnis des Refugiums von Dr. Gravely
Escape The Room: Le Secret de la Retraite du Dr Gravety
Escape the Room: Secret of Dr. Gravely_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Retreat
이스케이프 더 룸: 닥터 그래블리 별장의 비밀
boardgame.description: What are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;Escape the Room_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; games?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Escape the Room games began as digital adventures and quickly turned into real-life events all around the world where players are locked in a room and must uncover clues and hidden objects to escape. ThinkFun_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s version of Escape the Room allows you to bring all the excitement of these experiences into your very own home!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Mystery:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The year is 1913 and you are the lucky winner of a free stay at Foxcrest Retreat, where the famed Dr. Gravely has improved upon the latest in spa treatments and relaxation for those of high social standing. You take a long all-expense-paid train ride to the retreat. Upon your arrival, however, you and your fellow guests may find the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;health retreat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; is not what it seems..._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Objective:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Work with your guests to discover the dark secret of Dr. Gravely's retreat by finding clues and solving puzzles. But be careful...in the story, the doors have shut and locked behind you. Will you and your guests discover the secret and escape the room before time runs out?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Episode 70 - Interview with Renegade Game Studios Scott Gaeta

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Played (and really enjoyed!) once only. Repacked carefully following the instructions from the ThinkFun website and ready to go again.....! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s as good as new. We played it on the day we received it and repackaged it immediately afterwards... it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s now ready for passing on to the next group who want it. This is a great escape room experience and I highly recommend it!! I will be ordering the other version.... This game comes from a smoke and pet free home. Shipping within the UK mainland will be £2.80 or collection can be arranged at no cost from Hove, East Sussex, BN3
